# LARGE INDICATORS MODE (EVF/OVF)

Select **ON** to display large indicators in the optical or electronic viewfinder. The indicators displayed can be selected using:

**SCREEN SET-UP > LARGE INDICATORS DISP. SETTING**

!Large Indicators Mode EVF/OVF OFF
!Large Indicators Mode EVF/OVF ON

> âš ï¸ Some icons are not displayed when **ON** is selected for LARGE INDICATORS MODE (EVF/OVF) (ðŸ“– 15).

> ðŸ’¡ If LARGE INDICATORS MODE is assigned to a function button, the button can be used to toggle LARGE INDICATORS MODE on (**ON**) and off (**OFF**) (ðŸ“– 221, 252).

# LARGE INDICATORS MODE (LCD)

Select **ON** to display large indicators in the LCD monitor. The indicators displayed can be selected using:

**SCREEN SET-UP > LARGE INDICATORS DISP. SETTING**

!Large Indicators Mode LCD OFF
!Large Indicators Mode LCD ON

> âš ï¸ Some icons are not displayed when **ON** is selected for LARGE INDICATORS MODE (LCD) (ðŸ“– 17).

> ðŸ’¡ If LARGE INDICATORS MODE is assigned to a function button, the button can be used to toggle LARGE INDICATORS MODE on (**ON**) and off (**OFF**) (ðŸ“– 221, 252).
